CRANACH Tools

CRANACH Tools

Claim Coupon to Save:6 Tools IN ONE Versatile Multitool Pen.Level,stylus,pen. Fathers day gifts for dad husband.You will get Gifts for men dad,construction tools pen in a stylish box.CRANACH multitool pen for engineer,carpenter,etc.Great for home improvement, electrical, and DIY.Tool pen is an innovative tool which truly a work of art with engineering that combines the daily tools into a multitool to provide endless functions. CRANACH provides 2/4/6/10 packs Boxes option.
2022 Upgraded Decent Work Cool Pen:There is an omnidirectional tip on CRANACH stylus pen,capable of moving on the screen. This allows for accurate movements,drawings, and precision touches.With a built-in level tool, you’ll never have unlevel pictures hanging.The sleek design of multifunction pen makes the ballpoint pen easy to handle and write smoothly. Its lightweight and balance can give you an enjoyable writing experience.Gifts for Dad Men Women.Fathers day gifts from daughter for men dad.
Durable EDC Pen Pocket Tool:Tool gadget lovers will enjoy a mini tech construction tool pen anywhere anytime! Pull the tip out and double-ended shows: Phillips and flathead, So wherever you are, you’ll always have a multi screwdriver.Constructed of heavy-duty aluminum metal and come with 2 ink refills, built to be durable and last for endless tough projects.The compact size of mini multitool and pen clip make it portable.Gifts for Him Men Husband Dad Women.Fathers day gifts from daughter kids
Stocking Stuffers for Men Women, Gifts for Him Men Husband Dad Women,Gift Wrap Available: CRANACH multitool pen is in unique gift box that pops out a funny giraffe. Multitools & accessories are surprising women men stocking stuffers for construction engineer woodworker carpenter mechanic auto repair,etc.Women Men’s gifts for him,father,dad,husband on Birthday,Father’s Day,etc. Men won’t know they need a neat construction tool multitool pen until they have! fathers day gifts from daughter
Story of CRANACH Multi Tool Pen: “designed to do more”.The classics pocket tool pen will last long so you can buy with confidence. “Easy to use,enjoy the work,happy body and mind”is what we pursue. We believe that with our belief in quality. CRANACH can help you get more stuff done.If you have any issues with multifunctional pen,please let us know.We are always here.Bring you a work pen, bring you more projects done and the pleasure. CRANACH provides 2/4/6/10 packs Boxes option.

Super Smart On-the-Go Multitools & Accessories

  • As the old adage goes, the pen is mightier than the sswwoorrdd..and as pens go, this multi tool pen might just be the mightiest! We have more respect for the humble writing instrument.

Story of CRANACH Multi Tool Pen: “designed to do more”

  • “Easy to use, enjoy the work, happy body and mind “is what we pursue. We firmly believe that with our belief in quality commitment, our construction tool multifunction pen will help you get more stuff done.

6 Handy & Essential Functions in ONE EDC Pen, CRANACH provides 2/4/6/10 packs Boxes option.

  • Ballpoint Pen （With 2X D1 Size Pen Refills）
  • Stylus
  • Level
  • Flat head Screwdriver (2mm)
  • Phillips Screwdriver (2.5mm)
  • Metric & Inch Ruler

CRANACH provides 2/4/6/10 packs Boxes option.

Top Features of Streamlined Gadget Tool for Men Women

Bright Yellow Metal Barrel, Lightweight, Well Built, Stable, Imported, Portable DIY Gadget with Clip.

Practical & Stylish Cool Tech Gifts for Men Women Who Have Everything, Gift Wrap Available. Take tool pen for your house maintenance or office.

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $29.99 - $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:13:48 UTC – Details)

From the brand

TOOL DAILY

Tool Daily has accumulated abundant manufacturing experience in the past 20 years and possess our own factory.

HOT SELLING PRODUCT

PRODUCTO DE VENTA CALIENTE

HOT SELLING PRODUCT

PRODUCTO DE VENTA CALIENTE

Adjustable Snow Foam Lance with 1/4″ quick connection fitting. Container Capacity: 1 Liter / 0.22 Gallon. Specification: 1000 PSI to 3000 PSI.
EASY to install: fill some soap into the bottle with warm water to get thick foam; Then connect 1/4″ quick connection plug to Pressure Washer Gun or Wand. Finally, adjust the knob on the top to desired foam level and then foam sprayer will disperse thick foam. The knob adjusts the foam dispensing amount and the nozzle adjusts the sprinkle pattern.
Adjustable nozzle for accurate mixing and foam generation. Turn the top knob right (-) to get the thickest mixture, adjust the nozzle to get a proper sprinkle pattern, and let it loose.
5 Nozzle Tips have different angle (0, 15, 25, 40, 65 degree). Choose different nozzle according to the actual need. Such as watering flowers and plants, washing car. They also can be attached to a Quick-Connect Wand for swifter application and more.
Application: ideal for Motorcycle, Car Washing; Roofs, Driveways, Siding washing; floors, Windows washing, it is best product for Detailing Trucks or SUVs.

Read more

Tool Daily: The Great Brand for Pressure Washer Accessory

Tool Daily are committed to developing more efficient and safer pressure washer accessory, helping people reducing the tiredness of spraying and cleaning in the garden. We are known for amazing pressure washer accessory, such as nozzle, wand, gun, coupler, foam cannon.

Feature

  • Universal foam cannon with 1/4″ quick disconnection fits almost all pressure washer.
  • Adjustable foam cannon can mix cleaning fluid with water accurately and generate foam quickly.
  • The bottle can be filled in with 1 Liter cleaning fluid. Spray angle and suction amount of cleaning fluid can be adjusted according to needs.
  • It is used to wash motorcycle, car, roofs, driveways, siding, floors and windows.
  • Working Condition: 1000 PSI to 3000 PSI
  • Max Temperature: 60℃ / 140℉.
  • Bottle Capacity: 1L.
  • PACKAGE INCLUDE
  • 1 X Foam cannon
  • 1 X Red Stainless Steel Nozzle Tip (0 Degree)
  • 1 X Yellow Stainless Steel Nozzle Tip (15 Degree)
  • 1 X Green Stainless Steel Nozzle Tip (25 Degree)
  • 1 X White Stainless Steel Nozzle Tip (40 Degree)
  • 1 X Brass soap nozzle tip (65 Degree)

Read more

How to Install Foam Cannon

Step 1. Fill some soap into the bottle with warm water. The foam cannon’s bottle is graduated and can hold 1000 ml.

Step 2. Connect 1/4″ quick connection plug to pressure washer gun or wand.

Step 3. Adjust the knob to desired foam level and then it disperses thick foam.

Read more

Ideal for Motorcycle, Car Washing; Roofs, Driveways, Siding washing; floors, Windows washing, it is best product for Detailing Trucks or SUVs.

Read more





Short Pressure Washer Gun with Foam Cannon
Pressure Washer Adapter Set
High Pressure Washer Gun, with Replacement Wand Extension
Foam Cannon Bottle with Straw
pressure washer foam cannon

Specification M22 Fitting 3/8″ quick connect M22 Fitting 1 Liter / 0.22 Gallon 1 Liter / 0.22 Gallon 50 FT X 1/4 Inch








telescoping pressure washer wand
Pressure Washer Hose

15 Inch Pressure Washer Surface Cleaner with Wheels
pressure washer short gun
6-in-1 Quick Changeover
Specification max burst pressure is 9000 PSI 3/8 Inch x 50 FT 25 FT X 1/4 Inch 1/4″ quick connect 1/4″ quick connect 1/4” Quick Connect

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

From the manufacturer

New Sprouts Fix It!

Give your little fixer everything they need to complete pretend construction and repair jobs with New Sprouts Fix It!, one of the popular pretend play activity sets from Learning Resources!

Pretend Tools for Little Hands!

Sized for little hands, this set’s five toddler-safe tools include a pretend saw, screwdriver, hammer, wrench, and drill!

Imaginative Fix-It Adventures!

Made from chunky plastic, these pretend tools add a touch of realism to all kinds of imaginative play—the drill even makes noise!

Toolbox for Storage!

When repairs are finished for the day, all of the tools store safely inside the included tool box until the next game of pretend.

Ages & Stages

Imaginative Skills

Let imaginations soar with this toy that builds creativity and social skills through immersive role play!

Hand Strength

Give little hands the strength they need to hold a pencil, play on the playground, and more with this fun hands-on toy!

Social Skills

Kids develop social-emotional learning skills with this toy’s fun activities that support healthy emotions and communication!

Building Someone Amazing

When the toy you choose is from Learning Resources, you’re helping your child build who they will become – whether an architect, an A student, or just an all-around awesome kid!

TOY TOOLS: Little tools for big imaginary projects. Surprise your children with this toddler tool set
TODDLER-SAFE TOOLS: Encourage imaginative play with toddler-safe tools made from durable, soft plastic
TODDLER TOOLBOX INCLUDES: Includes saw, hammer, screwdriver, wrench, drill, and toolbox
REALISTIC SOUNDS: Squeeze the drill and it makes sounds
Give the Gift of Learning: Whether you’re shopping for holidays, birthdays, or just because, toys from Learning Resources help you discover new learning fun every time you give a gift!
Kids’ Toys for Stocking Stuffers!: From fidget toys and board games to puzzles and beyond, our screen-free learning and education toys make the perfect Christmas gifts for boys and girls!

onlineCalendar,

);

Price: $29.95 - $25.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:19:38 UTC – Details)

Product Description

The only tool in the marketplace able to diagnose & repair LED lights!

The LED Keeper fixes LED holiday light sets. It is every decorator’s must-have and saves you not only time, but money. No need to toss your pre-lit décor when you have lights out. Use the LED Keeper to keep your holidays bright!

How it Works

The LED Keeper uses insulation piercing to connect to the copper within the light set wires and illuminate functioning sections by creating mini-circuits. Success is achieved through the process of elimination.

Complete Tool for the Repair of LED Light Sets

The LED Keeper pays for itself and is provides everything you’d need to fix a light set:

Built-in Bulb & Fuse Tester
Includes 2 Universal Replacement PODs
2 Place Markers to assist in testing are also included
Comes complete with a 9V battery
Has a Bulb Puller

Fixes sets with replaceable or non-replaceable bulbs

Use a POD if your set is experiencing a socket issue that cannot be solved, if the precise replacement bulb for the set cannot be located, or if the set has non-replaceable (sealed construction) LEDs. The PODs were designed to repair LEDs only. If you were to use a POD on an incandescent set, the set would not illuminate and remain dysfunctional. The PODs were not designed to illuminate but are necessary for the repair of the LED set in order to maintain the electrical balance. If a POD is not used and a dead bulb/socket remains, then more voltage is being forced upon the remaining functional bulbs.

Every decorator’s must-have!

This Cool Yule Tool saves you time and money. No more throwing your light sets and pre-lit décor away. Now you can save them with the squeeze of a trigger. There are also numerous resources available to assist you as you become a light set repair Pro yourself! We have instructional videos and even have a toll-free number available with U.S.-based techs to assist in all of your light set repair questions.

Fixes LED Light Sets (Does NOT work on Incandescent light sets)
2 Universal PODs included to assist with socket issues or if you simply don’t have the correct replacement bulb your set requires
2 Place Markers included to assist with testing
One 9 Volt battery included
Pays for itself
Intended for conventional Christmas LED light sets that are manufactured in series design.
Cannot assist with incandescent, rope lights, light sets with control boxes, low voltage or battery-operated light sets.

From the brand

Depets, founded in 2016, is a professional pet supply brand. We specialize in pet daily necessities, toys, cleaning and grooming supplies.

Over the years, we have been dedicated to providing high-quality products and great services to pets and pet owners around the world. Our goal is to make a better life for pets with every pet owner.

cat feeder, cat cone, cat door

pet supplies

pet toys, pet carrier sling

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 9.37 x 5.43 x 2.17 inches; 5.61 Ounces
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Depets
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08FJ655HL

Great Brush, Healthy Pets. The cat grooming brush with round beads can do massage for your pets and prevent scratching your pet’s skin. The design of stainless steel needles with a 60-degree bend and some elasticity is good for preventing skin disease and increasing blood circulation.
One-click Cleaning Button. You just have to Simply push the button and the hair will be super simple removed from the cat hair brush. Furthermore, our dog grooming brush is washable, which can be kept in clean.
Comfortable and Nonslip Handle. Our cat shedding brush is designed with a comfort-grip and nonslip handle, and this self cleaning cat brush also has a massage function for your hand and you won’t get tired easily when you brush your pet.
Enjoyable Brushing Experience. Grooming pets can strengthen communication and further the bond between you and your pets. Our pet brush is suitable for all breeds and coat types. With Depets dog and cat shedding brush, your beloved pet will enjoy the time of grooming.

From a variety kind of pet brushes, I chose this one for my own lovely pets (Yoyo & Yiyi). Every time I brush Yiyi, she rubs my hand and makes enjoyable meow. As for my doggy Yoyo, she always has a happy face when I do this to her. We all love this cat and dog shedding brush, so I want to share it with every pet owner and I hope you and your beloved pet will enjoy it like us.

Washable:Washable feature keep the brush hygienic

Size: 7.7″ ×4.1″(L×W)

Color: blue + white

Material: Stainless steel + ABS Plastic + Rubber

Read more

The round end of the needles can do massage for your pets without scratching his/her skins, which is good for preventing skin disease and increasing blood circulation.

The comfort-grip handle is designed to prevent hand and wrist strain.

Read more

Valuable Brush. This cat slicker brush can easily remove loose hair, shedding Mats, tangled hair, Dander and Dirt of your lovely pets, our cat brushes for indoor cats not only keep your pets clean, but also provide you with a hygienic home environment.

Healthy Pet. The dog shedding brush with round beads can increase blood circulation and keep your pet’s coat soft and shiny.

Read more

Usage

Step1: Brush your pet with gentle move.

Step2: Click the button.

Step3: Remove the hair from the pet brush.

Read more

How to reduce the pain during brushing?

  1. Hold the hair root with one hand, comb along the direction of hair growth with the other hand;
  2. When the hair knots are serious behind the ears and on the neck, the movements should be gentle;
  3. Comb the long hair layer by layer, turning the outer layer over and combing the inner layer.

What if my pet doesn’t like this dog and cat hair brush?

You can guide with snack, lengthen the grooming time every day, our self cleaning slicker brush is gentle and not stimulating, your cute pet will gradually like it.

Note:

  1. Store out of reach of children.
  2. Stress may cause skin irritation, you should brush your pet gently.
  3. Be careful with pets that suffer from skin irritation or weak skin sensitivity.

item.content:encoded:
Price: $69.99 - $59.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:23:38 UTC – Details)



HIGH-QUALITY PRECISION BITS: Come with 25 precision bits and 10 mainstream types, which can meet daily maintenance needs. All screwdriver bits are made of S2 steel with a hardness of up to 60HRC. Compare with CR-V, S2 steel has the advantages of high strength, wear resistance, and corrosion resistance. Every bit is machined with high precision to avoid damaging the screw. Specially used for precision object disassembly, such as repairing computers/tablets/game consoles/cameras/watches, etc.
ADVANCED APPEARANCE: Extremely textured aluminum alloy frosted appearance, bringing you a delicate touch. Electric screwdriver dark gray appearance design brings advanced visual experience. Aluminum shell surface treated with anodic oxidization, anti-sweat, and anti-corrosion. PC+ABS high-strength engineering plastic shell bottom, sturdy and durable. Stylish, high-end precision screwdriver set is the perfect gift.
BUILT-IN MAGNETIZER MAGNETIZATION ANY TIME: The storage box has an integrated magnetization area design, which can be magnetized at any time for the equipped bits and any screwdrivers to better absorb precision screws. The practical magnetic design aims to save time and effort. Small torque setting keeps you from over-tightening screws. HOTO useful precision screwdriver set is a decent gift for both professional and amateur.
EASY USE & PORTABLE MAGNETIC BOX: HOTO electric screwdriver with all-aluminum alloy non-slip shell, surface three-dimensional texture design, make the grip more stable and less slippery. The front end of the screwdriver has a built-in magnet, and the batch head is magnetically installed for quick replacement. One-button start design, easy to use, even users with zero experience can easily operate. TPU soft rubber material buttons, provide a comfortable feel.
TYPE-C & PORTABLE BOX: Type-C charging port, suitable for charging cables of various electronic products, enabling charging anytime, anywhere. Comes with a storage box, lightweight and compact design makes it easy to put in a bag and carry outdoors. The magnetic design makes it much easier to use and prevents the loss of the bit. Precision screwdriver built-in 350mAh lithium battery with long battery life. The battery can punch 500 screws once fully charged.
